issue.title: Segway process uses too much memory

content.raw: It is worth noting all python string objects assigned to DRMAA job template attributes are automatically "cast" to unicode objects. This is done by the Python DRMAA API by overriding the `__set__` operator and calling the C library reference implementation. It is the C library implementation call that returns a unicode object.
content.html: It is worth noting all python string objects assigned to DRMAA job template attributes are automatically "cast" to unicode objects. This is done by the Python DRMAA API by overriding the __set__ operator and calling the C library reference implementation. It is the C library implementation call that returns a unicode object.
